page.title: 07 HEATH FARM
page.content: {FARMING Heath Farm is situated between Wandlebury and Gog Magog Golf course with fifty acres of land for cereals and potatoes. Other uses include vegetables, fruit, pigs, beef, cattle, chickens, turkeys and geese. {FARM SHOP Sells own meat, eggs, apples, plants, vegetables and potatoes. Other produce is bought locally such as honey and other vegetables. During the week 500+ visit the shop open Tuesday to Saturday between 9am to 6pm. { BUILDINGS Farmhouse built in early 1800s. Barns are used for animals in summer and crop storage in winter. Others for fowl and storing machinery. Pets:dog,cat,rabbit,goat,horses&donkey
